sentences.sContent: Refusal to sign meant forfeiture of property and exile.
sentences.sCn: 拒绝签字意味着被没收财产并流放国外。

synos.tran: （财产等的）没收；（权利、名誉等的）丧失

words.tran: 因受罚而丧失的；被没收的
罚金；没收物；丧失的东西
（因犯罪、失职、违约等）丧失（权利、名誉、生命等）

trans.tranOther: when someone has their property or money officially taken away because they have broken a law or rule
